body.name: SWOPT Premium Straight Broom + 48" EVA Foam Comfort Grip Wooden Handle, Combo — Cleaning Head with Long Handle Interchangeable with All SWOPT Cleaning Products — Broom Set for Smooth Surfaces
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 26. Order within 21 hrs 21 mins
features: COMBO PACK — Great for hardwood floors and other smooth surfaces, the stiff bristles on the SWOPT Premium Straight Broom easily captures fine particles and pet hair. The 60” EVA Foam Comfort Grip Wooden Handle adds stability and comfort to cleaning.

INTERCHANGEABLE — With the SWOPT cleaning system, all your cleaning tools use a single interchangeable handle, so that indoor cleaning heads can be “SWOPT” for outdoor tools at the push of a button. Say goodbye to cluttered cleaning closets!

SPACE SAVING — Don’t buy separate cleaning supplies like a mop, deck brush, and duster! The wood handle can be used with all SWOPT heads, making it easy to stay organized. Less handles to save more money and closet space.

SOLID HANDLE CONNECTION — Your handle will never twist loose again! Our Snap Lock Technology securely attaches each cleaning head to your handle, keeping it from twisting loose during use. The locking mechanism allows you to change cleaning heads quickly.

SWOPT CLEANING CO — Our products are built to last — we believe in the highest quality, finest craftsmanship and innovative design. We back them up with a lifetime warranty, so you can rest assured your cleaning tools will be effective for years to come.
body.description: The premium quality SWOPT Straight Broom is great for hardwood floors and other smooth surfaces. Stiff bristles on the broom easily captures fine particles and pet hair. Additionally, the 48” EVA Foam Comfort Grip Wooden Handle adds stability and comfort to cleaning. Durable and easy to use, this combo pack is perfect for a new homeowner gift.Stay organized and cost-efficient with SWOPT’s Snap Lock Technology. Simply snap, lock and clean with a variety of cleaning heads, all with an interchangeable handle. Wash & scrub away dirt from outdoor surfaces with SWOPT deck brush, scrub brush, wet mop and squeegee cleaning heads, or sweep away debris from high trafficked locations with SWOPT push broom cleaning heads. For indoor cleaning, SWOPT dust mop cleaning heads are safe for tile, laminate, and hardwood floors. There are even convenient hanging squares for mounting all the cleaning heads when not in-use, thanks to the SWOPT system organizer. Your cleaning closet can finally stay uncluttered.SWOPT products are built to last — we believe in the highest quality, finest craftsmanship and innovative design. We back them up with a lifetime warranty, so you can rest assured your cleaning tools will be effective for years to come.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our upright broom collection includes every broom head needed to keep your floors clean. The broom cleaning head collection includes angle brooms, straight brooms, push brooms, & medium to heavy-duty corn brooms. Select between 12”, 18”, or 24” heads depending on the size of your space. Select dust mop heads can be used wet or dry! Each dust mop cleaning head includes a machine washable microfiber cover. Outfit your SWOPT Cleaning collection with an assortment of wet mops, scrub brushes, and squeegees. Multiple sizes available, all easily ‘SWOPT’ with the push of a button!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product is excellent in terms of functionality. It delivers on its promises and is a great investment for anyone looking for a reliable and effective solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This broom is very sturdy. I bought it for a friend for outdoor use. The broom does a great job sweeping leaves and debris.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I mean after all a broom is a broom right? Wrong. This is the Cadillac of brooms. The bristles are so soft the handle so sturdy you would need an ax to break it. All wood. Now I have had so many brooms over the past 50 years of marriage and this one will not only out last me but probably my kids. It picks up dirt so much better than brooms made with those plastic type bristles it is an expressive purchase for a broom but you will not be disappointed and I bet anything it will be the only broom you will ever have to buy. Only thing is you will need to replace just the bristle portion some years from now otherwise not one complaint

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars works really well
reviews.reviewText: works great, just not as wide as i expected

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this system! I say system because of the attachments you can add to just one pole. It is a space saver for those challenged with smaller living spaces. It allows you to have some extras that help but you may not own because of space. I also bought the dust mop attachment because a broom doesn’t quite get some of that fine dust or pet dander that remains on smooth floors plus it gets under couches better. Consider other attachments now, you won’t be disappointed!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good quality
reviews.reviewText: This SWOPT broom is awesome! It’s really Madewell and has other attachments I plan on buying in the future. It has soft bristles, so it really picks up the dirt on hardwood floors easily. Also, it has a nice cushiony pad for your hand. Very nice room!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Broom Ever
reviews.reviewText: This is seriously the best broom I've ever owned. Even though you need to buy the handle separately it's still cheaper than many of the others out there. But seriously I've never had a broom work this well. I'm disabled and sweeping is hard, well it was hard until I found this broom. The quality is great and I can't see needing to replace it for some time. But when I do need a new one I'll get this again. I really can't say how much I love this broom.

Growing up in the 60s and 70s my parents had a broom that was spectacular. I assumed all brooms were that good. When I moved out and bought a red broom, the kind the big box stores sell, I was extremely disappointed. When my parents passed about 15 years ago, one of the things from their home I got was the broom. Really, it was that good. I don’t know why my siblings did not want it. Maybe they never did their chores.Anyway, fast forward to 2021, and my parents broom is still going strong. But I have it in the basement. I wanted a broom just a good as it for the main floor. So I ordered this one because the reviews are good and it looks the same as my fabulous broom. Guess what: this broom is just as good as the broom I have from the 60s. It is a fabulous purchase.Now if only someone would make a dust pan as good as the one my parents had, and that I still use.
I love it very much; it's a bit heavy but I like it and will order another one.
This is the broom I was always looking for and the last broom I'll ever need.

reviews.reviewTitle: Bent pole and missing broom attachment
reviews.reviewText: The product arrived in a perfect box with a bent broom pole, broken end and no brush attachment.

Love this broom, thought it was a bit on the pricey side but was not liking the brooms I had previously purchased. The bristles are soft but seem to pick up everything. Did lose a few bristles on first use but it seems to have stopped after a few uses.
